title: BREAKING: $19+ Airfare Sale, Today Only!
text:
Home > Flight Deals > BREAKING: $19+ Airfare Sale, Today Only! BREAKING: $19+ Airfare Sale, Today Only! August 6, 2015 1:25am by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
Today and today only, low-cost carrier Frontier has put late summer and fall flights on sale for as little as $19 each way ($38 round-trip). Fares are valid for nonstop travel between August 18 and November 18, dependent on preferred route, though not on September 7 or October 12. Again, tickets must be booked by 11:59 p.m. ET tonight, August 5. 
These rates are available to Disc ... more 
Today and today only, low-cost carrier Frontier has put late summer and fall flights on sale for as little as $19 each way ($38 round-trip). Fares are valid for nonstop travel between August 18 and November 18, dependent on preferred route, though not on September 7 or October 12. Again, tickets must be booked by 11:59 p.m. ET tonight, August 5. 
These rates are available to Discount Den members. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of this sale by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros:
